seo.title: TechFlow - Modern Development Platform | Build the Future
seo.description: Streamline your development workflow with our powerful, secure, and scalable platform. Join 10M+ developers building the future with TechFlow.

hero.title: Build the Future with TechFlow
hero.subtitle: The Modern Development Platform
hero.description: Streamline your development workflow with our powerful, secure, and scalable platform. From prototype to production in record time. Join 10M+ developers who trust TechFlow.

features.title: Powerful Features for Modern Teams
features.description: Everything you need to build, deploy, and scale your applications with confidence. Built by developers, for developers.

performance.title: Lightning Fast Performance
performance.description: Built with modern web technologies for maximum performance and speed. Experience sub-second load times.

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: Industry-standard security protocols to keep your data safe. SOC 2 compliant with end-to-end encryption.

scalable.title: Infinitely Scalable
scalable.description: Grows with your business from startup to enterprise. Handle millions of users without breaking a sweat.

collaboration.title: Team Collaboration
collaboration.description: Built for teams with real-time collaboration tools. Work together seamlessly from anywhere in the world.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Industry Leaders
testimonials.description: See what our customers have to say about their experience with TechFlow.

gallery.title: Behind the Scenes
